properties.body:
BRAZIL-NORTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY BY M/V HAWK EXPLORER
   TOWING 5.4 MILE LONG CABLES:
   A. IN PROGRESS ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      05-57.27N 050-22.73W AND 04-31.58N 048-45.02W.
   B. 14 THRU 16 JUN ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      06-01.38N 050-19.23W AND 03-47.27N 047-46.72W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 17 JUN.
